project.name: J-C209A-LUCE-08-ST02-DT01-DF18-CF13-01
project.description: This test attempts to insert a new record into a MySQL database. In the event of a SQLException during execution of the insert command, diagnostic information about the database connection and SQL statement will be dumped to the output stream.

iopair.name: J-C209A-LUCE-08-ST02-DT01-DF18-CF13-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variables defining database connection parameters including username and password.

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
